about_the_game:
Drawn to a mysterious cathedral, a boy sets out to unlock its secret.

Traverse calm and colorful landscapes, where reflexes, persistence, and a sense of adventure drive you forward in this exploration-based platformer.

Run, jump, climb, and swim your way through (10) atmospheric settings, with each offering a distinct look and unique features.

Gather crystals, collect keys, unlock doors, and navigate environmental dangers while steering clear of over (20) perilous creatures.

Performed and recorded using live audio, (12) original songs create an ambient soundtrack to capture the mood and feel of each setting.

Unlocking each of the (14) chapters will allow you to continue your journey between sessions or replay select scenes.

Full controller support.

Keyboard controls:
Movement - arrows and/or WASD keys
Jump/Select - CTRL and/or spacebar
Menu - ESC

Between two and three hours of gameplay for experienced players while first-timers can expect this timeframe to double or triple!

With its rich visuals, thoughtful soundtrack, and simple mechanics, The Boy and the Cathedral is a modern take on classic gaming.
